Path of Life is the twenty-ninth Side Story in Arknights.

Additions[edit]

New devices:

  • Excrescent Carapace
  • "Little Handy"
  • Waterway Beacon

New enemies:

Normal
Elite
Boss

Operators[edit]

  • The following Operators will gain 50% extra Trust (except from Annihilation):
  • Operator Modules added for Hunter Snipers and the Medic version of Amiya.
  • The following Operators received a second Module:
    • Gladiia (HOK-Y)
    • Ifrit (BLA-Δ)
    • Penance (UNY-Y)
  • [Global] Operator Modules no longer require the Operator's Trust at specific thresholds to be unlocked; upgrading them now requires the Operator to have at least 50% and 100% Trust for Stage 2 and 3, respectively.

Headhunting[edit]

Main article: Headhunting/Banners § Current
  • The Anchor in the Deep headhunting banner is featured.
  • [Global] The Operators available in the Starter Headhunting banner are updated to the following:
  • [Global] From December 17, 2024, the following Operators are moved from the Standard headhunting pool to the Kernel headhunting pool:

"Emergency Supplies" Blueprint Chip[edit]

Main article: "Emergency Supplies" Blueprint Chip

Conundra of the Sophontheatrum[edit]

“Where knowledge resides, puzzles hide. Within these walls lie conundrums woven from the myths of ancient sages and the fresh queries of your companions. The next time you pass the Sophontheatrum, why not pause for a moment of contemplation? Your inadvertent ingenuity may unlock the answer to these timeless mysteries.”

The Conundra of the Sophontheatrum[note 1] mission rewards can be claimed until December 24, 2024.

Festival Sign-In Event[edit]

From December 3, 2024 to December 13, 2024, login to the game for 7 days to claim the following rewards:

30K
Day 2

On the first 5 days, the player can choose one of two tastes, Savory or Sweet, which awards either a Zongzi Decorative Table (Savory) or Zongzi Decorative Table (Sweet) based on the taste chosen by all players on the 5th day.

Store[edit]

  • Scene and Legacy are now available for purchase in Distinctions Store and Universal Certificates Exchange Area.
  • [Global] Starter Monthly and Special Training Packs are added to Packs Store.
  • The following packs are available in the Packs Store, which can only be purchased once per account:

Guard Chip Pack

Outfits[edit]

The following outfits are available in the Outfit Store:

New
Re-edition

Furniture[edit]

The Abyssal Hunter Lab furniture theme is available; some of its parts are obtained from the Conundra of the Sophontheatrum missions while others are available for purchase in the Materianomicon Moderatrix and the Furniture Store.

Miscellaneous[edit]

  • [Global] Players who created an account before the event will receive the following items (as an in-game mail) upon logging into the game for the first 180 days after the event, which will also be awarded for newly created accounts as part of beginner missions from this point:
    1. 1 Top Operator Transfer Permit - Starter
    2. 1 Ten-roll Kernel Headhunting Permit
    3. 1 Headhunting Permit
    4. 1 Senior Operator Training Invitation Letter
    5. 1 Senior Operator Training Apparatus
    6. 8 Advanced Material Voucher
  • [Global] Anniversary and New Year greetings voicelines are added for all existing Operators.
  • [Global] The Secret Sanctuary will be superseded by the Crystallization Sanctuary and Contract Bounty will be exchanged into Crystal Contract Bounty at a 1:1 ratio.
  • [Global] Record Restoration added for Lingering Echoes in December 17, 2024.
  • [Global] Training Grounds introduced.

Operator Records/Paradox Simulations[edit]

New Operator Records and/or Paradox Simulations are added for the following Operators:

Operator Operator Record(s) Paradox Simulation

Have A Safe Trip Staying Sober

CVs[edit]

[Global] New CVs added for the following Operators, which also completes the addition of Korean CVs.

Operator CV

EN: Ashleigh Haddad
KR: Min-ah
EN: Nikki García
KR: Lee Myung-ho
EN: Javier Bañas
KR: Lee Sae-ah

Media[edit]

Trivia[edit]

  • With over 96,000 Chinese characters, Path of Life surpasses The Rides to Lake Silberneherze as the longest Side Story that is not tied to a Celebration event.

Notes[edit]

  1. ↑ "Conundra" is the supposed plural of the pseudo-Latin conundrum ("a confusing/difficult problem/question"); "Sophontheatrum" is a portmanteau of Greco-Latin sophon (σοφός, "wise/sage") and Latin theatrum ("theater").
  2. ↑ "Materianomicon" is a portmanteau of Latin materia ("matter") and the fictional suffix -nomicon (the knowledge of a certain subject as in Necronomicon); Moderatrix is Latin for "female moderator/moderatress".
